umm i downloaded it, followed steps but 
this error came up

"GLW_StartOpenGL() - could not load OpenGL subsystem"

what am i suppose to do now ?

I don't know, but check out your graphics card. It's definitely a graphics problem. If you have a lower quality card, buy a new card for optimal performance or try this (I don't know if it works, but try): Right-click the shortcut you normally use, then Properties. In Properties, open the Compatiblity tab and check 'Run in 256 colours'. I don't know if that'll help, but try it. If it doesn't work, search Google with your problem as a search string. Try this: 
"GLW_StartOpenGL() - could not load OpenGL subsystem, Star Wars - Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy, help, opengl"
Could you please stop mentioning that this isn't Jedi Academy 2 we got that already and does the game actually work? can someone confirm?

also., the "jasp" application (which has the jedi academy logo, for it's item image) which is found in the "crack" file also refuses to work due to an "openal32.dll" system error, having reinstalled the whole program software as it requests, i still have had no progress :(
This is supposedly a great game but so far it has just been a great pain. any help would be greatly appreciated :)
